title: Best of The Herd
itunes:title: Best of The Herd
description:
Colin discusses the Lakers decision to move on from head coach Frank Vogel and why this once storied franchise is quickly falling apart. He believes the latest story about Tom Brady almost joining the Dolphins ownership group speaks volumes about his relationship with former head coach Bruce Arians. He also tells you why he was right about Tiger Woods and wrong about Joel Embiid. Plus, NBA Champion Metta Sandiford-Artest joins the show to give his thoughts on the Lakers disappointing season and how to fix NBA star players missing games. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
